Package source.FileIO.Serializer.Text

Class BaseSerializer

java.lang.Object
source.FileIO.Serializer.Text.BaseSerializer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampSerializer, EnquirySerializer, StaffSerializer, StudentSerializer, SuggestionSerializer
public abstract class BaseSerializer extends Object
The BaseSerializer class stores the necessary data for sub serializers for the text format.
Since:
11/12/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected char
    delimiter
    The delimiter to separate between entries.
    protected boolean
    useHeader
    Denotes whether to serialize this object with a header or not.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BaseSerializer()
    A default constructor that sets the delimiter to a default value of ',' with headers enabled.

    An overloaded constructor that sets the delimiter and header
